modName: Dark Forests of Skyrim - Davids Trees edition
summary: Dark Forests of Skyrim adds thousands of trees and hundreds of new types of flora to Skyrim.  This version replaces vanilla pines with Davids Trees.  Updated 12/30 with better textures for the snowy pines thanks to Zhoulia
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Dark Forests of Skyrim - David's Trees edition[/size]


[size=4]by mobiusbelmont


[left]﻿[/left][youtube]cTbWjxXifaA[/youtube]
[/size]Thanks to Hodilton for this preview[size=4][left]﻿[/left]



[/size][size=3]This mod is the same as Dark Forests of Skyrim, but changes vanilla trees to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77330/?]David's Trees[/url].  For a full description of the custom forests added by this mod, please see the full description [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87139/?]here[/url].  [/size]



[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/d3f4cb3e84a9a1f4d0933842ce95e96a/tumblr_p03uk7eukp1s2ptqso1_540.jpg[/img]



[size=5]Installation:  [/size]

[size=3]Install ONLY ONE of the Main files with pre-generated LOD 
- patches available for The Blue Forest, Skyrim Bigger Trees, and Realistic Aspen Trees

OR

install the Core Files plus Billboards (miscellaneous section) and generate your own tree LOD with TES5LODGen or DynDOLOD 
[/size]




[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/b4a54c17c0e888c8eb46fe493f7584c1/tumblr_p03uk7eukp1s2ptqso3_540.jpg[/img]




[size=5]Compatibility[/size]

[size=3]NOTE: almost any tree or landsape overhaul can be made compatible with billboards and one of the LOD generation programs above, EXCEPT in the case where both mods change the same model in the game (in this case one will overwrite the other).  So mods listed below as "not compatible" will not work with Main files that contain pre-generated tree lod.  
[/size]

[size=5]NOT Compatible: [/size]
[size=3]Skyrim Flora Overhaul (one mod overwrites the other)
Dark Fantasy Overhaul (FOR NOW..patch on the way to resolve some conflicts/eliminate some overwrites)
Fantasy Forest Overhaul (forested areas might cause severe clipping and also not look good)
Enhanced Vanilla Trees (untested, try the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87139/?]standalone version of Dark Forests of Skyrim[/url] with EVT)
Skysight - Simply Bigger Trees (again, [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87139/?]try standalone version[/url] with SSBT)
Enhanced Landscapes (untested and may have major overlapping /clipping issues)[/size]

[size=4]
UPDATED 12/30/2017 with better textures for the snowy dead pines thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13593925]Zhoulia[/url].  Please drop her an endorsement for this amazing work[/size]




[size=5]
[/size][size=5]Credits:[/size]
 
[size=3]David for his amazing [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77330/?]David's Trees[/url]
Tamu75 for the aspens
HiltsBrandon for Aspens to Cherry Blossoms
Mentha for the More Colorful Trees resource 
Phitt for the Sheogorad resource
GKB for the lovely green tree resource
Vurt for some dead models, a few [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]textures and the large juniper trees[/url]
3AMt for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61932/?]dead pines[/url]
Elenin and Ztree for their outstanding [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38651/?]tree resource[/url]
Zilav for the amazing billboard generator tool and TES5LODGen
Sheson for DynDOLOD[/size]
author: mobiusbelmont
